#Projects

Smart Brain

⎯⎯

An application that allows you to detect faces of submitted images through the power of artificial intelligence. The user just has to enter the image url links. The application handles registration, signin, user data and many more. It was built by react js in the frontend, Node js and express js in the backend and uses postgresql as its database.

Alcatraz

⎯⎯

The official commercial site for Alcatraz. Still in development...

Meeting Notes

⎯⎯

Convert the audio and voice of a meeting into written text easily! A Web application that converts audio into written text. Still in development

Keiko Corp

⎯⎯

A Leading tech start up website named Keiko Corp.<br> made for the Hacktoberfest 2020 challenge

Robofriends

⎯⎯

Robofriends. A react application that lets you live search and filter from a directory of Robos using many of the react js cutting edge technology.

Background Generator

⎯⎯

Make cool, free backgrounds quickly for your project with this easy to use tool. An app that allows the user to set the page's background color and get a color representation in real time

Landing Page

A cool startup landing page for any idea that comes up. We never know! (:
